com.brickgame.block

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brickgame.block.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to destroy a target upon collision.

    The bombs are built as an List of Block objects, forming an X shape, akin to that of a sea mine.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Block>> bombs 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomb()
      An empty Bomb object.
      Bomb(int[] coords, java.util.List<Block> group)
      A constructor with coordinates as a 2D-array where the required Block, BlinkingBlock, and HiddenBlock objects are created and organized in the given group.
      Bomb(int i, int j, java.util.List<Block> group)
      A constructor with raw coordinates where the required Block, BlinkingBlock, and HiddenBlock objects are created and organized in the given group.

    • Method Summary

    • Field Detail

      • bombs

        public static java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Block>> bombs

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int i,
            int j,
            java.util.List<Block> group)
        A constructor with raw coordinates where the required Block, BlinkingBlock, and HiddenBlock objects are created and organized in the given group.
        Parameters:
        i - Horizontal position. Must be from 0 (inclusive) to 10 (exclusive) to show on the screen.
        j - Vertical position. Must be from 0 (inclusive) to 20 (exclusive) to show on the screen.
        group - A List containing the Bomb's elements.

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int[] coords,
            java.util.List<Block> group)
        A constructor with coordinates as a 2D-array where the required Block, BlinkingBlock, and HiddenBlock objects are created and organized in the given group.
        Parameters:
        coords - A 2D-array with the coordinates. Must range from [0, 0] (inclusive) to [9, 19] (inclusive) to show on the screen.
        group - A list containing the Bomb's elements.

      • Bomb

        public Bomb()
        An empty Bomb object.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(Constants.Direction direction)
        Moves Bomb one unit cell to the specified direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - One of Direction.UP, Direction.DOWN, Direction.LEFT, Direction.RIGHT.

      • checkExplosion

        public boolean checkExplosion(java.util.List<Block> target)
        Manages collision detection.
        Parameters:
        target - Block and BlinkingBlock objects to be destroyed.
        Returns:
        Whether any explosion happened.

      • explode

        public void explode(java.util.ArrayList<Block> bomb,
                    java.util.List<Block> target)
        Destroys the bomb and the target.
        Parameters:
        bomb - An exploding Bomb.
        target - Block and BlinkingBlock objects to be destroyed.

      • explode

        public void explode(java.util.List<Block> target)
        Destroys the targets hit by the last Bomb in the bombs static list.
        Parameters:
        target - Block and BlinkingBlock objects to be destroyed.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
